character.name: Louis
description: Your gemologist. Uses <c=keyword>gems</c> to power up his cards, and <c=keyword>enfeebles</c> the enemy to lower their attack power.

gem.name: Gem
gem.description: While in hand fulfills 1 shard cost on all cards that haven't been played yet this turn.

preciousGem.name: Precious Gem
preciousGem.description: While in hand fulfills 2 shard cost on all cards that haven't been played yet this turn.

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: This card is not discarded or exhausted at the end of the turn it is drawn.

fleeting.name: Fleeting
fleeting.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, it is exhausted.

enfeeble.name: enfeeble
enfeeble.description: Lower the damage of the targeted ship part by <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> for the turn.

makeGemPrecious.name: upgrade gem
makeGemPrecious.description: Remove <c=cardtrait>gem</c> from this card and apply <c=cardtrait>precious gem</c> {{Duration}}.

makeCheapAndExhaust.name: reduce cost and exhaust
makeCheapAndExhaust.cardSelectText: Select a card that will cost 1 less energy and <c=downside>exhaust</c>.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> every time a card is <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>. Effect is doubled if the card wasn't <c=cardtrait>temporary</c>.
Steadfast.descriptionAlt: Increase the value of X on all cards by <c=keyword>{Amount}</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the end of the turn.

Onslaught.name: Onslaught
Onslaught.description: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=card>Burst Shots</c> at the start of every turn.

GrandEntrance.name: GRAND ENTRANCE
GrandEntrance.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 <c=card>Burst Shots.

BlissfulIgnorance.name: BLISSFUL IGNORANCE
BlissfulIgnorance.description: Choose 2 cards in your deck that don't <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>. They cost 1 less <c=energy>energy</c> and <c=cardtrait>exhaust.

BlackRose.name: BLACK ROSE
BlackRose.description: The first time a non-<c=cardtrait>temp</c> card would be <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>, it is not.

JewelryKit.name: JEWELRY KIT
JewelryKit.description: Add an <c=card>Encrust</c> and a <c=card>Polish</c> to your deck.

OsmiumRing.name: OSMIUM RING
OsmiumRing.description: All cards are <c=cardtrait>heavy. <c=downside>Draw -1 card every turn.</c>

FreeSpirited.name: FREE-SPIRITED
FreeSpirited.description: Whenever you <c=keyword>exhaust</c> a card, draw a card. If it exhausted via <c=cardtrait>fleeting</c>, draw a card next turn instead.

Paralyzer.name: PARALYZER
Paralyzer.description: The first time you would <c=action>enfeeble</c> a ship part each turn, <c=action>stun</c> it instead.

DiamondSword.name: DIAMOND SWORD
DiamondSword.description: <c=peri>Peri</c> cards deal +1 damage while you have a <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in hand.

CrystalOscillator.name: CRYSTAL OSCILLATOR
CrystalOscillator.description: The first time each turn you launch a <c=midrow>drone</c> while you have a <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in hand, it immediately takes a turn.

FireStone.name: FIRE STONE
FireStone.description: While you have 3+ <c=status>heat</c>, all attacks inflict <c=keyword>2</c> <c=action>enfeeble</c>.

RGBLED.name: RGB LED
RGBLED.description: Cards to the <c=keyword>left</c> of <c=cardtrait>gems</c> deal +1 damage.

InfinityGem.name: INFINITY GEM
InfinityGem.description: Whenever you play a card with a <c=status>SHARD</c> cost you can't pay, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

DiamondTier.name: DIAMOND TIER
DiamondTier.description: <c=card>Card offerings</c> in combat offer an extra card if there is a <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in hand.

DiamondHands.name: DIAMOND HANDS
DiamondHands.description: <c=action>Strengthen</c> also increases the potency of <c=action>enfeeble</c>. The first time you play a <c=A63447>Louis</c> card each combat, <c=keyword>strengthen it by 1</c>.

PositiveReinforcement.name: POSITIVE REINFORCEMENT
PositiveReinforcement.description: Whenever you spend <c=status>REDRAW</c> on a <c=cardtrait>fleeting</c> card, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

Transience.name: TRANSIENCE
Transience.description: Whenever a card exhausts via <c=cardtrait>fleeting</c>, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

QuartzResonator.name: QUARTZ RESONATOR
QuartzResonator.description: While you have <c=status>PLUS CHARGE</c>, fulfill 1 <c=action>shard cost</c> on all cards that haven't been played yet this turn.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Fading Diamond</c> to your hand.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Fading Diamond</c> to your hand.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Fading Diamond B</c> to your hand.

Encrust.name: Encrust
Encrust.description: Rightmost card gains <c=cardtrait>gem</c> for the rest of combat.

description.None: Choose a <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in <c=keyword>hand</c>. <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> it and gain {{Amount}} <c=status>shard.
description.A: Choose a <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in <c=keyword>hand</c>. <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> it and gain {{Amount}} <c=status>shard.
description.B: Choose a card in <c=keyword>hand</c>. <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> it and gain {{Amount}} <c=status>shard.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Fading Diamond</c> to your <c=keyword>draw and discard piles</c>.
description.A: Draw a card. Add a <c=card>Fading Diamond</c> to your <c=keyword>draw and discard piles</c>.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Fading Diamond</c> to your <c=keyword>draw and discard piles</c>, and your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
Add an <c=card>Unobtainium B</c> to your hand.

Polish.name: Polish
Polish.description: Choose a <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in hand. Make it <c=cardtrait>precious</c> for the rest of combat.

LouisExe.name: Louis.EXE
LouisExe.description: Gain 1 of {{Amount}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=A63447>Louis</c> cards and a <c=card>Fading Diamond</c>.
